infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to track your home status and provide location-based features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location in the background to track your home status and provide location-based features.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Pinky Promises to use your location to track your home status and provide location-based features.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Pinky Promises to use your location in the background to track your home status and provide location-based features.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Pinky Promises to use your location to track your home status and provide location-based features.
